CatDescriptText: Mrs. Alverna Caldwell, 1029 Rivermont Drive, Glen-Hazel, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 16, 1957, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think that parents should be imprisoned for the unlawful acts of their children (under 18 years of age)?" answer reads: "Yes, the parents should be responsible and imprisoned for the acts of their children. Perhaps this way, the children will be kept out of beer gardens and receive better care."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Alverna Caldwell, wearing earrings and light colored textured coat, standing with hands in pockets in front of automobiles and hillside
